citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1 pm to 1:30
pm on 23-MAY-18.
During that time, the inspector waited at the facility for 30 minutes.
